text: ke’ālahimi beẖonechi chirota lezebikilachewi፡፡ ‘āmele met’ifo libe derek’imi beẖoniki noro kezurīyahi betebetenu neberi፡፡ ke’inerisumi yik’iri beli፡፡ le’inerisumi miḥiretini leminilachewi፡፡ benegerumi hulu āmakirachewi፡፡ k’urit’i ḥāsabimi baderegihi gīzē be’ālahi layi temeka፡፡ ālahi berisu layi temekīwochini yiwedalina፡፡
